tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Harmesh Kapoor MS Ortho, Medical superintendant, A one Hospital.
 I suffered a fracture of my Femur. The Doctor after analyzing the x-rays and MRI scans lucidly explained to me that at my age of 70 years, a surgical implantation of Rod & screws would be the best for me to recover on my feet at the soonest time.
 Follow-up surgery and house visits was taken by the doctor. Suggested exercises advised by him  was done religiously. I am happy to say that I am walking and on my own within 4 months and am on the right path to full  recovery in another 2 months.
We never felt rushed through the surgery and I would highly recommend Dr. Kapoor and his team at A one Hospital to others.It has been a pleasure and a relief to know we can count on Dr. Harmesh Kapoor in time of need.

* * * *****************  *  ***********************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Thank you so much for the best service and surgery.
Dr. Harmesh Kapoor is best in his genuine advice, always supportive, and most importantly a very knowledgeable doctor to cure all orthopedic issues. I reached him when I had a neck sprain, ankle sprain, and recently for my ankle surgery with full trust in him.
Thank you so much, doctor!

review: It was wonderful experience. I got relief in few hours. . I highly recommend Dr. Kapoor.  He is very cooperative.

tags: None
review: The doctor and the place is a suspicious . They charge fee and give you medicine and ask you for second visit. He told us he will tell us next steps in second visit but he gave more medicine. When we did not understand why he kept giving medicine, we asked what’s going on. So he got rude to us and said do not question his suggestions. After a long discussion he said nothing can be done and my mother needs to take medicine life long.
reply_text:
Actually the patient was explained that it is a chronic condition.
She had severe changes in the spine which can not be reversed with medication.
Patient wanted some quick solution for which it was explained in a frank manner which patient 's attendant did not like.
She told what is the point of treatment if you don't have medicines to reverse old bony changes in the spine(degenerative).
Rather than giving false assurance.
I feel it is better to tell truth to the patient which sometimes patient take otherwise..

tags: None
review: Charge 400 rs extra just for glucose testing. Not much statisfied with the treatment pain still persists.
reply_text:
It is not possible.
There must be confusio.
Either injection or other tests must have been done.
U can clarify anytime at the reception or with the doctor...
